official-title.#text: To prohibit the payment of death gratuities to the surviving heirs of deceased Members of Congress.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: Congressional Death Benefit Elimination Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Prohibiting payment of gratuities to survivors of members of Congress

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the contingent fund of the Senate, or any other appropriated funds for a death gratuity payment to the widow, widower, or heirs-at-law of any Member of Congress who dies after the commencement of the Congress to which the Member has been elected.

text.#text: No payment may be made from the applicable accounts of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall be construed to prohibit or affect the payment to any individual of any unpaid balance or salary or other sums due to a Member of Congress who dies after the commencement of the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Congressional Death Benefit Elimination Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to which the Member has been elected.

header.#text: No effect on other payments to survivors

term.#tail: means a Senator or a Representative in, or Delegate or Resident Commissioner to, the Congress.

text.#text: For purposes of this Act, a
This Act shall apply with respect to any death occurring after the date of the enactment of this Act.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3594 IH: Congressional Death Benefit Elimination Act of 2013
